plugin.name: â˜€ï¸ Daily Journal
plugin.description: Support for daily journalling in NotePlan, including start-of-day template, and end-of-day review questions. Before use it requires some configuration: please see website for details.
plugin.author: Jonathan Clark

plugin.commands.name: todayStart
plugin.commands.description: Apply Daily Note Template to Today's Calendar Note (requires configuring)

plugin.commands.name: dayReview
plugin.commands.description: Ask journal questions for an end-of-day review (requires configuring)

plugin.settings.title: Review Section Heading
plugin.settings.description: The name of an existing markdown heading after which the review answers are added - if it doesn't exist, it is added at the end of the note.

plugin.settings.title: Review Questions
plugin.settings.description:
This string includes both the questions and how to layout the answers in the daily note. (NB: you need to use "
" for linebreaks rather than actual linebreaks, as even JSON5 doesn't fully support multi-line strings.)
plugin.settings.default:
@work(<int>)
@fruitveg(<int>)
Mood:: <mood>
Gratitude:: <string>
God was:: <string>
Alive:: <string>
Not Great:: <string>
Wife:: <string>
Remember:: <string>

plugin.settings.title: List of moods
plugin.settings.description: A comma-separated list of possible moods to select from.
